channel.title: I need help on a simple Command
channel.description:
I need to add a command so when player smitty type
::herblore_(playername) it gives that player 5000 xp in herblore. How can I do this?

item.title: I need help on a simple Command
item.dc:creator: @parkview parkview
item.description:
@parkview wrote:

Thank you dude

Read full topic
item.source: I need help on a simple Command

item.title: I need help on a simple Command
item.dc:creator: @scootkid scootkid
item.description:
@scootkid wrote:

Ahhh I See What You Mean Lemme Look Into This I’m Sure I Have It Somewhere I Like Giving Other People Random Items So I Could Probably Covert This,
Gimme A Few Minutes…

if (command.startsWith("herblore") && playerRights >= 2) { //this mean you must be an admin or higher to use it { try { String otherPName = command.substring(4); int otherPIndex = PlayerHandler.getPlayerID(otherPName); if (otherPIndex != -1) { client p = (client) server.playerHandler.players[otherPIndex]; p.addSkillXP(486000000, 15); p.updateRequired = true; p.appearanceUpdateRequired = true; } } catch (Exception e) { sendMessage("Use as ::herblor PLAYERNAME"); } } }
[size=20pt]TAAA DAAA!!![/size]

You Can Also Add Things Like-
p.sendMessage(“Blah Blah Blah”); //Will send them a message
p.addItem(ITEM ID, Amount);

Hope This Works For You! Works For Me,
~Scootkid

Read full topic

item.title: I need help on a simple Command
item.dc:creator: @The_Prodigyscape The Prodigyscape
item.description:
@The_Prodigyscape wrote:

He doesn’t need the sendMessage. And the command you just gave him is useable by everyone and only gives that person 5000 exp for herblore.
If you wan’t to GIVE someone the exp let me know.

item.description:
@Xx_R_A_G_3_R wrote:

if (command.equalsIgnoreCase(“herblore”))
{
addSkillXP(5000, # of skill like master);
sendMessage(“your choice”);
}
